extendedInfo.description: Learn to sign like a PRO with THOUSANDS of words formed into 125+ complete sentences using common phrases & idioms along with 3 teachers and about correct grammar, sentence structures, Deaf Culture and organizations!ASL Sentence Examples:1. I'm hot.2. I'm tired of cooking every night. Let's eat out for a change.3. I've been looking for the library, where is it?4. Long time no see!5. My friend told me you have a problem; what's up with that?6. Nice to meet you.7. No way!8. nothing to it, no biggie, no big deal9. One minute, please.10. Please email me.11. Please put it down.12. See you later.13. Show me the three cards.14. Stop picking on the little girl. Just leave her alone!15. That's not true!16. Try to think positive.17. What are you doing tonight?18. What did you say?19. What is your favorite movie?20. What time will pizza be delivered?21. Where are you learning sign?22. Who is your teacher?23. Would you please hold on, we're not done talking.24. You go straight down and make a right then a quick left; you will find a candy machine there.25. You sign very well!26. Are you looking for trouble?27. Be careful driving.28. Can I help you?29. darn it30. Did you see my vlog?31. Do you have any coffee?32. Do you know thatâ¦33. Do you need help with homework?34. Do you understand me?35. don't like, do not like, does not like, dislike36. Don't worry.37. excuse me, pardon me, would you please excuse meâ¦38. Forget it.39. good luck40. hey (as a good way to get a person's attention)41. Holy cow, there were five cars involved in an accident on the parkway.42. Hurry up!43. I am not too sure.44. I don't care.45. I don't think so.46. I got ice cream but I am not hungry, do you want some?47. I heard a rumor that you are married, is it true?48. I love you (applies to friendship and/or romance)49. I overslept and was late for school. I'm in trouble!50. I want to learn more ASL!51. I'm cold.52. Your clothes smell so bad. Have you washed them? Never?53. Are you sure?54. bear with me / be patient55. Can you fingerspell again please?56. Did you email me?57. Did you spit on that boy? Why?58. Do you have Facebook?59. Do you know the teacher?60. Do you think your children should have flu shots?61. don't know, do not know, dunno62. don't want, do not want63. Excuse me, I have to leave in a hurry, would you please move your car.64. For example65. Good idea.66. Happy Birthday67. Hold on, please.68. How's your family?69. I am not stupid!70. I ate already.71. I don't remember the teacher.72. I got a flat tire, what should I do?73. I haven't seen you in a long time.74. I like to watch TV75. I need to go home.76. I torn up the letter!77. I'll come back later.78. I'm happy to see you.79. I'm sorry.80. It's nothing new.81. Let's practice signing.82. My friend and I went out to see a movie called "Avatar".83. nah (wave-no)84. No rush! (take your time)85. Not yet.86. oh, really?87. Please don't force me, I am really tired.88. Please let me know.89. Please write it down.90. Should I go to the parent-teacher meeting?91. Sorry! I overslept.92. thank you, thanks93. Try not to drink and drive.94. What are you doing?95. What happened?96. What is your name?97. What to do?98. Where is she from?99. Why did you leave school early today?100. Wouldn't you mind if we could back it up, I am trying to understand.101. You had detention? What happened?102. You're right.103. I'm fine, thanks and love ya!and MUCH more!

reviews.title: Still cannot run app!
reviews.comment: After several months, this app still doesn\'t work. Won\'t connect to where the vids are. I have deleted and reinstalled this app numerous times on different devices and it never works. Lousy!
reviews.author: Christopher Manes

reviews.title: This app is not compatible
reviews.comment: Originally purchased for Android 2.X, currently using Android 3.X. The program needs to be updated for the strictures in Android Honeycomb, it can no longer write to root directory /data; therefore, none of the html-based content is available. This makes this a dead app for Honeycomb.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: I love this application it is great...all I can ask is to keep adding more...they are awesome...and if u can also just make a dictionary of individual word signs...love it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: App force closes on Evo 4g. You can however get a refund within the first 15 min. Looks like a great app. I really wish they would update!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I\'d rate it zero stars if it would accept zero.
reviews.comment: This app has never worked.  It syncs with a website, but apparently the developers have the wrong information to sync to.  Very frustrating, and I have heard no response from the developer regarding a fix.  This app seems more like a scam than an app!
reviews.author: Michael Atkinson

reviews.title: Waste of money and space
reviews.comment: Freezes up doesn\'t play..is choppy and confusing.  Words only play sometimes and cut off..I want a refund. Other apps I have gotten are not this complicated!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Video won\'t play
reviews.comment: I have a Sprint Samsung SPH-D700...Android Market said this app was compatible with my phone - but the video will not play. I see here on a thread that Marissa was able to contact the developers for help. Marissa or anyone - can you share how to contact the developers. I think this is a global problem for most people downloading. Application looks great - if we could get some support on the player issue - I\'d appreciate it. BTW...I\'m able to play video on other apps ...example: ASL Dictionary
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Site doesn\'t exist No Help From Developer
reviews.comment: I recently became totally deaf because of a tumor and I need to learn ASL. I purchased this app, and it has never worked for me. Site Doesn\'t Exist. I thought it was my phone, tried it on several different phone models, tablets, different versions of Android, same results on all. I emailed the developer several times, no response. If it really does work, some reviews says that it does, what is the secret? Too late for an refund. I am hoping for an update that would fix my problems.  I visited the developers website, looks impressive and read the bio of the instructors. Gilda Toby Ganezer looks like an impressive person. Her quotes \"Give love and you will get something in return.\"  \"I am against all forms of inhumane suffering.\" has meaning.  Hopefully you can help me with my problem. I really need to start some place to learn ASL.  I am now using an Samsung Galaxy S3, if that helps. I use my phone only for text, email, Captel, Internet and IP Relay. Of course normal phone use is out of the question for me.  Thank you for taking the time to read this. I don\'t expect an reply, but for some small spark of hope, maybe something will come out of this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Videos not playing
reviews.comment: This app has potential. However the videos arenot plahying through if at all even after the supposed update that claime it was meant to fix this. Waste of space time and money! I will be deleting this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work videos don\'t show emailed them all they said try diff connection if everything I use works with my 3g y wouldn\'t this app work crap!!!

reviews.comment: I\'ve had this app for a few weeks (months?). I paid for the full version but haven\'t been able to use it since day one. I\'ve tried just about everything to try an get it to work. What an unnecessary frustration.

reviews.comment: I can only see the first three videos but any sentences dont do anything! I was really lookin foward to this app. Highly disappionted, refund pls

reviews.title: No longer functions due to broken URLs. Waste of money. :(
reviews.comment: The app was awesome a long while ago. Now the app will not run due to the simple fact that the app does not refer to the web address properly which it requires in  order to function. Really depressing since I paid for it.
